Search the NPPES by NPI

Source: R/defog_npi.R
defog_npi.Rd

Search the NPPES by NPI

Usage

defog_npi(npi)

Arguments

npi

10-digit National Provider Identifier (NPI)

Value

A tibble containing the NPI(s) searched for, the date-time the search was performed, and a list-column of the results.

Examples

defog_npi(1528060837)
#> Warning: Event: on_file_type_mismatch
#> Warning: Event: on_suspect_content
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>   search     datetime            outcome data_lists   
#>   <chr>      <dttm>              <chr>   <list>       
#> 1 1528060837 2024-07-21 14:27:59 results <df [1 × 11]>
